Class java.io.Reader

Added interfaces java.io.Closeable, java.lang.Readable.

Added Constructors
Reader(Object) Creates a new character-stream reader whose critical sections will synchronize on the given object.
 

Changed Constructors
Reader(void) Change of visibility from public to protected.
 Creates a new character-stream reader whose critical sections will synchronize on the reader itself.
 

Added Methods
Reader nullReader() Returns a new {@code Reader} that reads no characters.
int read(CharBuffer) Attempts to read characters into the specified character buffer.
long transferTo(Writer) Reads all characters from this reader and writes the characters to the given writer in the order that they are read.
 

Changed Methods
int read(char[], int, int) Change in exceptions thrown from no exceptions to java.io.IOException.
 Reads characters into a portion of an array.
int read(char[]) Change in exceptions thrown from no exceptions to java.io.IOException.
 Reads characters into an array.
 

Added Fields
Object lock The object used to synchronize operations on this stream.
